7.2. Header <boost/process/basic_pipeline.hpp>

7.11. Header <boost/process/pistream.hpp>
7.12. Header <boost/process/posix_child.hpp>
7.13. Header <boost/process/posix_launcher.hpp>

7.19. Header <boost/process/win32_launcher.hpp>

7.1. Header <boost/process.hpp>

Convenience header that includes all other Boost.Process public header files. It is important to note that those headers that are specific to a given platform are only included if the library is being used in that same platform.

7.2. Header <boost/process/basic_pipeline.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the basic_pipeline template. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    template<typename Command_Line> class basic_pipeline;
  }
}

7.3. Header <boost/process/child.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the child class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class child;
  }
}

7.4. Header <boost/process/children.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the children class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class children;
  }
}

7.5. Header <boost/process/command_line.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the command_line class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class command_line;
  }
}

7.6. Header <boost/process/config.hpp>

Defines macros that are used by the library's code to determine the operating system it is running under and the features it supports. 


BOOST_PROCESS_WIN32_API
BOOST_PROCESS_POSIX_API

7.7. Header <boost/process/exceptions.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the exceptions thrown by the library: not_found_error and system_error. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class system_error;
    template<typename T> class not_found_error;
  }
}

7.8. Header <boost/process/forward_decls.hpp>

This header provides forward declarations for all public types included in the library. It is interesting to note that those types that are specific to a given platform are only provided if the library is being used in that same platform.

7.9. Header <boost/process/launcher.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the launcher class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class launcher;
  }
}

7.10. Header <boost/process/pipeline.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the pipeline class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    typedef basic_pipeline< command_line > pipeline;  // Generic instantiation of the basic_pipeline template. 
  }
}

7.11. Header <boost/process/pistream.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the pistream class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class pistream;
  }
}

7.12. Header <boost/process/posix_child.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the posix_child class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class posix_child;
  }
}

7.13. Header <boost/process/posix_launcher.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the posix_launcher class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class posix_launcher;
  }
}

7.14. Header <boost/process/posix_status.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the posix_status class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class posix_status;
  }
}

7.15. Header <boost/process/postream.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the postream class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class postream;
  }
}

7.16. Header <boost/process/status.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the status class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class status;
    status create_status(int);
  }
}

7.17. Header <boost/process/stream_behavior.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the stream_behavior enumeration. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    enum stream_behavior;
  }
}

7.18. Header <boost/process/win32_child.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the win32_child class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class win32_child;
  }
}

7.19. Header <boost/process/win32_launcher.hpp>

Includes the declaration of the win32_launcher class. 

namespace boost {
  namespace process {
    class win32_launcher;
  }
}
